.. _api:

PyProximal API
==============

The Application Programming Interface (API) of PyProximal is composed of 3 elements:

* *Orthogonal projections*
* *Proximal operators*
* *Solvers*

Orthogonal projections
----------------------

.. currentmodule:: pyproximal.projection

.. autosummary::
   :toctree: generated/

    BoxProj
    HyperPlaneBoxProj
    SimplexProj
    L0BallProj
    L1BallProj
    EuclideanBallProj
    NuclearBallProj
    IntersectionProj
    AffineSetProj
